DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of electroacupuncture on functional constipation.
DOC.brief_title: Electroacupuncture for the Treatment of Functional Constipation
DOC.detailed_description: This study will supply significant evidence for using acupuncture to treat functional constipation(FC), and will help us to identify whether it is a therapeutic effect rather than a placebo effect.
